sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Missing input validation on size parameter could lead to buffer overflows or memory corruption if tainted data is used.

sinks.name: TEE_MemCompare
sinks.reason: The size parameter can be manipulated to cause out-of-bounds access, leading to memory corruption or security issues.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Potential unencrypted output to Normal World if dest is shared

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Missing input validation on size parameter could lead to buffer overflows

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Shared memory operations if src points to shared memory

sinks.name: snprintf
sinks.reason: Unencrypted output to Normal World if the buffer is shared

sinks.name: snprintf
sinks.reason: Missing input validation if size is derived from tainted data

sinks.name: strcmp
sinks.reason: Tainted data could lead to unencrypted output affecting security decisions.

sinks.name: strcmp
sinks.reason: Tainted data could lead to unencrypted output affecting security decisions.

sinks.name: strlen
sinks.reason: Missing input validation on the pointer, leading to potential out-of-bounds access or undefined behavior.
